fact.plotter

Class BarPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • stream.AbstractProcessor
      • stream.ConditionedProcessor
        • stream.plotter.DataVisualizer
          • fact.plotter.BarPlotter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    stream.Processor, stream.StatefulProcessor

    public class BarPlotter
extends stream.plotter.DataVisualizer
    This class can plot a bar graph with errorBars by calculating the mean and standarddeviation for a each key and event. The key has to refer to something which can be represented by a Double.
    Author:
    bruegge
